医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
坏血病可能会在经济紧张的情况下卷土重来医生在治疗一名中年男子后在《BMJ 病例报告》杂志上表示，随着生活成本危机和减肥（减肥）手术的增加，由维生素 C 缺乏引起的坏血病可能会重新出现。与条件。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241022/Scurvy-may-be-making-a-comeback-amid-economic-strain.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241022/Scurvy-may-be-making-a-comeback-amid-economic-strain.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9243d2dc-32b8-4198-b844-2a05f359affa Tue, 22 Oct 2024 22:48:33 -0400 Scurvy may be making a comeback amid economic strain
研究表明精神分裂症与心源性猝死风险增加有关表明，在没有既往患有心脏病的情况下，精神分裂症患者因心血管原因意外死亡的终生风险（称为心源性猝死）比一般人群高 4 倍以上丹麦研究在线发表在《Heart》杂志上。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241022/Study-links-schizophrenia-to-increased-risk-of-sudden-cardiac-death.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241022/Study-links-schizophrenia-to-increased-risk-of-sudden-cardiac-death.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d9768b69-9d4f-4a30-aaa2-e50edfaa69e8 Tue, 22 Oct 2024 22:45:02 -0400 Study links schizophrenia to increased risk of sudden cardiac death
城市中丰富的绿化可能会降低与高温相关的死亡并改善福祉发表在开放获取期刊 BMJ Open 上的一项对现有研究的系统综述发现，城市地区丰富的绿色空间与较低的与高温相关的疾病和死亡率以及更好的心理健康和福祉有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241022/Abundant-greenery-in-cities-may-lower-heat-lated-deaths-and-improve-wellbeing.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241022/Abundant-greenery-in-cities-may-lower-heat-lated-deaths-and-improve-wellbeing.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=53ba93d1-c882-4373-940f-8750d4902fa7 Tue, 22 Oct 2024 22:40:21 -0400 Abundant greenery in cities may lower heat-related deaths and improve wellbeing
新药 WNTinib 有望治疗小儿肝癌一种名为 WNTinib 的新药可以延缓肿瘤的生长并提高肝母细胞瘤（一种发生在幼儿中的肝癌）的生存率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241022/New-drug-WNTinib-shows-promise-in-treating-pediatric-liver-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241022/New-drug-WNTinib-shows-promise-in-treating-pediatric-liver-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0e50c2db-c7ce-4b9c-91f4-2cf3c3219b69 Tue, 22 Oct 2024 22:36:59 -0400 New drug WNTinib shows promise in treating pediatric liver cancer
医疗保险选择引发老年人的旋转门目前，全国各地数以千万计的老年人和严重残疾人面临着一个选择：是坚持当前的医疗保险选项，还是在公开参保期间进行改变。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241022/Medicare-choices-spark-revolving-door-for-older-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241022/Medicare-choices-spark-revolving-door-for-older-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1d4c484e-d13f-47cb-ac19-d2941292e75f Tue, 22 Oct 2024 22:32:11 -0400 Medicare choices spark revolving door for older adults
组织硬化与 HER2 阴性乳腺癌的疾病进展有关发表在《临床癌症研究》上的一项研究证实，最常见类型的乳腺癌（HER2 阴性）中的组织硬化可直接导致疾病进展和转移，从而给患者带来不利的结果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241022/Tissue-stiffening-linked-to-disease-progression-in-HER2-阴性-breast-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241022/Tissue-stiffening-linked-to-disease-progression-in-HER2-阴性-breast-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c15d6a9b-10f7-4fe4-b4ac-d8412e8e93ce Tue, 22 Oct 2024 22:29:27 -0400 Tissue stiffening linked to disease progression in HER2-negative breast cancer
对黑色素瘤转移的新见解揭示了潜在的药物靶点威尔康奈尔医学院的研究人员发现了一种防御机制，可以保护皮肤癌细胞免受氧化应激并帮助它们扩散。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241022/New-insights-into-melanoma-metastasis-reveal-potial-drug-target.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241022/New-insights-into-melanoma-metastasis-reveal-potial-drug-target.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=751f08f7-7704-4ec7-89e8-cb89f560d917 Tue, 22 Oct 2024 22:27:33 -0400 New insights into melanoma metastasis reveal potential drug target
幼儿疫苗接种可显着减少刚果民主共和国的mpox死亡人数耶鲁大学公共卫生学院研究人员的一项新分析显示，为刚果民主共和国（刚果民主共和国）流行性痘痘地区的五岁以下儿童接种疫苗将显着减少该国的死亡人数。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241022/Vaccination-of-young-children-could-dramatically-reduce-mpox-deaths-in-DRC.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241022/Vaccination-of-young-children-could-dramatically-reduce-mpox-deaths-in-DRC.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9114bdcf-7524-49a8-8909-84384e0bc79e Tue, 22 Oct 2024 22:24:56 -0400 Vaccination of young children could dramatically reduce mpox deaths in DRC
地板擦拭为 COVID-19 监测提供新见解COVID-19 将会持续存在。随着限制和人体测试的减少，新的研究正在解决我们如何监测、预测和预防 COVID-19 病例和爆发的挑战，特别是在住院患者等弱势群体中。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241022/Floor-swabbing-offers-new-insights-for-COVID-19-monitoring.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241022/Floor-swabbing-offers-new-insights-for-COVID-19-monitoring.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=859acf99-39f0-42b0-aeec-6dfd1fce4cd0 Tue, 22 Oct 2024 22:08:36 -0400 Floor swabbing offers new insights for COVID-19 monitoring
身体测试为肺癌患者提供预后见解巴西和美国的研究人员对转移性肺癌患者进行的一项研究发现，他们在坐下、站立和行走等简单身体测试中的表现可以帮助医生得出预后和治疗方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241022/Physical-tests-offer-prognostic-insights-for-lung-cancer-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241022/Physical-tests-offer-prognostic-insights-for-lung-cancer-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8bf509a3-1242-43d3-850d-82458d746d3a Tue, 22 Oct 2024 21:42:07 -0400 Physical tests offer prognostic insights for lung cancer patients
